ModMetaData.name: The UAC Kit - Outfits only
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the Union Aerospace clothing in the game. No other memes.
Combat Extended compatible
Credits: Jesus Christ - Died for our sins Odstriman - Textures, lab coat and business suit Viceroy - Weapon sounds, coding Tynan - Coding Shinzy - Coding organization Jecrell - Chicken coding D_unit01 - Original DOOM weapons mod inspiration
